viewData.name: ASUS 13.3" ZenBook Flip S UX370UA Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy ASUS 13.3" ZenBook Flip S UX370UA Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop featuring 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8550U Quad-Core, 16GB LPDDR3 | 512GB PCIe 3.0 x4 SSD 13.3" 1920 x 1080 Multi-Touch Display. Review ASUS Flip S
viewData.long_description: The 13.3" ZenBook Flip S UX370UA Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop from Asus is a compact system built for on-the-go users. Thanks to its 360° hinge, you can flip it into multiple viewing modes to best fit your current application. Specs-wise, it's powered by a 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8550U quad-core processor, 16GB of LPDDR3 RAM, a 512GB PCIe 3.0 x4 SSD, and integrated Intel UHD graphics. Its 13.3" multi-touch display has a 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution, wide 178° viewing angles, and an 80% screen-to-body ratio for more immersive viewing. Other integrated features include 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.1, two USB Type-C ports, a webcam, speakers, a microphone, and a 3.5 mm combo audio jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Pro. For your convenience, a Mini Dock is included, which features HDMI, USB 3.1, and USB Type-C connectivity for additional devices.
